name: HorseEntityHelper
description: The HorseEntityHelper class provides specialized functionality for interacting with horse entities in Minecraft, offering access to horse-specific properties like variants and stats.
overview:
The HorseEntityHelper class provides specialized functionality for interacting with horse entities in Minecraft. This helper offers access to horse-specific properties including variant information, taming status, equipment, and performance statistics like speed and jump height. It extends AbstractHorseEntityHelper and inherits comprehensive methods for managing horse ownership, breeding, and combat attributes.

Horses are tamable passive mobs that can be ridden by players after taming and equipping with a saddle. They come in different color variants with marking patterns, and each horse has randomized stats for health, speed, and jump strength that determine their overall quality for riding and transportation.

Notes and Limitations:
- HorseEntityHelper only works with entities of type minecraft:horse.
- The getVariant() method returns raw integer values that need to be decoded to understand the horse's appearance.
- Horse stats are determined at spawn and cannot be changed through normal gameplay mechanics.
- Performance calculations like getHorseSpeed() are approximations but are very close to actual values.

methods.name: getVariant
methods.description: Returns the raw integer variant value representing the horse's color and markings. This value needs to be decoded to understand the specific appearance.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Get the UUID of the horse's owner, or null if unowned.

methods.name: isTame
methods.description: Check if the horse is tamed.

methods.name: isAngry
methods.description: Check if the horse is angry (will not accept taming attempts).

methods.name: isBred
methods.description: Check if the horse was bred by players.

methods.name: isSaddled
methods.description: Check if the horse has a saddle equipped.

methods.name: canWearArmor
methods.description: Check if the horse can wear horse armor.

methods.name: canBeSaddled
methods.description: Check if the horse can be saddled.

methods.name: getInventorySize
methods.description: Get the size of the horse's inventory.

methods.name: getSpeedStat
methods.description: Get the horse's movement speed attribute value.

methods.name: getHorseSpeed
methods.description: Get the horse's speed in blocks per second.

methods.name: getJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get the horse's jump strength attribute value.

methods.name: getHorseJumpHeight
methods.description: Get the horse's maximum jump height.

methods.name: getHealthStat
methods.description: Get the horse's maximum health value.

methods.name: getMaxSpeedStat
methods.description: Get the maximum possible speed stat for this entity type.

methods.name: getMinSpeedStat
methods.description: Get the minimum possible speed stat for this entity type.

methods.name: getMaxJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get the maximum possible jump strength stat for this entity type.

methods.name: getMinJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get the minimum possible jump strength stat for this entity type.

methods.name: getMaxHealthStat
methods.description: Get the maximum possible health stat for this entity type.

methods.name: getMinHealthStat
methods.description: Get the minimum possible health stat for this entity type.

methods.name: isFood
methods.description: Check if an item can be used to feed/breed the horse.

methods.name: canBreedWith
methods.description: Check if this horse can breed with another entity.

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The other entity to check compatibility with.
